subtasks: Moving vocal cords to produce sound.
Controlling breath support for speech.
Forming words with mouth and tongue.
Maintaining posture and gestures while speaking.
Turning body towards exit direction.
Walking towards and through the exit.
Approaching the vehicle.
Unlocking or opening the vehicle door.
Climbing into the vehicle seat.
Fastening seatbelt.
Sitting or adjusting seat position.
Engaging in smooth movement with vehicle.
Recognizing the arrival at the intended location.
Preparing to disembark from the vehicle.
Opening vehicle door or exiting mechanism.
Exiting the vehicle.
Turning direction towards the barn.
Walking towards the barn’s entrance.
Adjusting attire for comfort and protection.
Gripping tool handles or equipment.
Positioning body to access machinery controls.
Starting the tractor engine.
Engaging the front or rear wheels.
Controlling steering direction.
Managing speed and acceleration.
Switching gears in the transmission.

tasks.task: Attaching a bale handler to the tractor.
subtasks: Tethering the bale handler to the tractor drawbar.
Ensuring proper coupling and safety.
Guidance of the tractor and attachments towards hay.
Activating the bale handler.
Grasping and lifting bales with the handler.
Transporting the bales to storage or desired location.
Planning the stacking or arranging of bales.
Maneuvering the tractor to enter the barn.
Aligning hay bales with storage areas.
Lowering bales into position.
Ensuring bales are securely placed.
Checking for stability and potential hazards.
Ensuring no rot or mold development.
Assessing bale arrangement efficiency.
Opening/closing ventilation structures.
Monitoring airflow within the barn.

tasks.task: Checking animals for health or maintenance needs.
subtasks: Approaching livestock in the barn.
Visual inspection of animals.
Handling tools or equipment for checks (e.g., brushes, muzzles).
Attending animals as needed (e.g., feeding, grooming, checking vitals).
Preparing feed for animals.
Distributing feed to animals.
Writing or typing observations or log entries.
Data entry into a record-keeping system.
